dataIdInfo.idAbs: <DIV STYLE="text-align:Left;"><DIV><DIV><P><SPAN><SPAN>The Department of Environmental Protection (MassDEP) Major Facilities datalayer is a statewide point dataset containing the location of a subset of facility types regulated by MassDEP’s Bureau of Waste Prevention (BWP). The layer is stored in ArcSDE as BWPMAJOR_PT. In a preliminary effort to begin locating facilities regulated by MassDEP, the BWP chose to locate facility types having the greatest potential environmental significance. At this time, the following facility types have been located: - Large Quantity Generators of Hazardous Waste (LQG) - Large Quantity Generator of MA-regulated Hazardous Waste (LQG_MA) - Large Quantity Generator of EPA/RCRA-regulated Hazardous Waste (LQG_RCRA) - Large Quantity Toxic Users (LQTU) - Hazardous Waste Recyclers (HWR) - Hazardous Waste Treatment, Storage and/or Disposal Facilities (TSDF) - Facilities with Air Operating Permits (AIR) - Facilities with Groundwater Discharge Permits (GWD) - Facilities with Surfacewater Discharge Permits (SWD). </SPAN></SPAN></P><P><SPAN><SPAN>Please note: the Solid Waste Land Disposal polygon datalayer contains point datalayers of active and historical solid waste Combustion Facilities, active Handling/Transfer Stations and Compost Sites. Active SW Combustion Facilities are a subset of the Air Operating Permits in this BWP Major Facilities layer.</SPAN></SPAN></P><P><SPAN>See the Location Documentation Table (BWPMAJOR_LDT) for documentation re: the types of features mapped, methods and sources used.</SPAN></P></DIV></DIV></DIV>

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Massachusetts Department of Environmental Protection Bureau of Waste Prevention

report.measDesc: Facilities with Air Operating Permits: 100% Facilities with Groundwater Discharge Permits: 100% Facilities with Surfacewater Discharge Permits: 100% Hazardous Waste Recyclers: 100% Hazardous Waste Treatment, Storage and/or Disposal Facilities: 100% Large Quantity Generators of EPA/RCRA-regulated Hazardous Waste: 87% Large Quantity Generators of MA-regulated Hazardous Waste: 59% Large Quantity Toxic Users: 90%

dataLineage.statement: Major landmarks in the development of the layer are as follows: - The layer was first conceived in April 1998. - The first major design changes came in March 2005 when Surface Water Discharges and Large Quantity generators of MA-regulated hazardous waste were added to the layer. Feature-level metadata were removed from the attribute table and included in a related "location documentation" table. - November 2009 was the first edition of the layer in which all "major" categories, with the exception of MA-regulated LQGs, were 100% located. - In December 2011, point features for solid waste facilities (including municipal solid waste combustion facilities) were made available via MassGIS, separate from the solid waste polygon layer. Please note MSW combustion facilities are a subset of the Air Operating Permits included in this layer. - In January 2013 many BWP Major locations were refined using imagery from multiple years of orthophotography, updated parcel data and a large field mapping initiative undertaken to confirm the locations of underground storage tanks. These updated UST locations are available via MassGIS.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

edom.edomvd: The facility engages in the recycling of hazardous waste.
The facility is a large quantity generator of one or more Massachusetts regulated hazardous wastes, including but not limited to, waste oil and PCBs.

descript.abstract: The point dataset represents a statewide point dataset containing the location of a subset of facility types regulated by MassDEP’s Bureau of Waste Prevention (BWP). In a preliminary effort to begin locating facilities regulated by MassDEP, the BWP chose to locate facility types having the greatest potential environmental significance. At this time, the following facility types have been located: - Large Quantity Generators of Hazardous Waste (LQG) - Large Quantity Generator of MA-regulated Hazardous Waste (LQG_MA) - Large Quantity Generator of EPA/RCRA-regulated Hazardous Waste (LQG_RCRA) - Large Quantity Toxic Users (LQTU) - Hazardous Waste Recyclers (HWR) - Hazardous Waste Treatment, Storage and/or Disposal Facilities (TSDF) - Facilities with Air Operating Permits (AIR) - Facilities with Groundwater Discharge Permits (GWD) - Facilities with Surfacewater Discharge Permits (SWD).
descript.purpose: This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.
